ygData.subject: Further Decepticon Negotations
ygData.msgSnippet: Shockwave: If Shockwave could smile and could show emotion, he would ve smirked at Hell Beast s words.  He didn t though, and he wasn t going to, ever.

Subject: Further Decepticon Negotations 
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: CompuServe 2000 32-bit sub 107
From: KSLawdogg@...

Shockwave:



If Shockwave could smile and could show emotion, he would've smirked at Hell 
Beast's words.  He didn't though, and he wasn't going to, ever.

"Correct.  Plans are already underway to collect new recruits.  A base is 
another matter.  This ice fortress is to small, weak, and secluded.  It would 
take to long to join another battle.  Though it will work good as a point to 
fall back on.  The two other Decepticons in my group are currently recruiting 
members from another faction."
